title: Commanding Kat
description: Kat is confident and aggressive in the courtroom but in her dreams she longs to submit to an uncompromising Master. Kat's law partner has the solution. She encourages Kat to join the infamous Society for Sexual Freedom with its kinky color-coded rooms and masks to protect the players' identities.Red is for BDSM and that's where Kat, calling herself K, meets the handsome Master J. After Kat watches Master J dominate a submissive, she vows never to see the man or the Red Room again. Master J manages to take his place in her night fantasies, however, with her in the role of the chained, moaning submissive. Kat is further unnerved the next day when she meets a new client who reminds her of Master J.The arrogant and demanding Chase Neill can't be the same man, can he? A return trip to the Red Room should clear up the mystery, but Master J has other plans for her alter ego K â€” to force her surrender to the greatest pleasure she has ever known.
author: Reese Gabriel
